description: Realiza el Marcado de la Venta
name: /pedidos POST

elements.name: Negocio un consumer key y secret key de la app de prueba

steps.name: I have basic authentication credentials `apigeeUsername` and `apigeePassword`
I have valid client TLS configuration
response body should be valid json
I store the value of body path $.credentials[*].consumerKey as globalConsumerKey in global scope
I store the value of body path $.credentials[*].consumerSecret as globalConsumerSecret in global scope

elements.name: Negocia un access token con el Authorization server

steps.name: I have basic authentication credentials `globalConsumerKey` and `globalConsumerSecret`
I have valid client TLS configuration
response body should be valid json
I store the value of body path $.access_token as access token
I have valid client TLS configuration
I set x-ismock header to true
response body should be valid json
I store the value of body path $.resultado.idAcceso as idAccess in global scope
I store the value of body path $.resultado.accesoPublico as publicKey in global scope

elements.description: Verificar que se realice la creación correcta del recurso relacionado a una transacción POST en /pedidos
elements.name: 201 Creado

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json
I have valid client TLS configuration
I set x-idEstacionTrabajo header to WS_CAJA
I need to encrypt the parameters {idUsuario, pagos.idTipo, pagos.importe, pagos.referencia}

I use the encryption algorithm RSA_PKCS1_PADDING and the key publicKey for prepare a body as {"idUsuario":"T146363","folioPresupuesto":"863167","folio":"V2312303","referencia":"VentaServicioWeb","pagos":[{"idTipo":"1","importe":"8771.01","referencia":"Cargo tarjeta"}],"foliosReferencia":[{"id":"v31485575ekt-01","idTipo":1}]}
response body should be valid json

elements.description: Verificar que se obtenga la información relacionada desde una transacción POST en /pedidos/folio/busquedas
elements.name: 200 ok.

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json
I have valid client TLS configuration
I need to encrypt the parameters {idUsuario, clienteUnico}

I use the encryption algorithm RSA_PKCS1_PADDING and the key publicKey for prepare a body as {"idUsuario":"T146363","clienteUnico":"1-1-4624-9705-1","fechaHoraInicio":"2021-01-30 08:00","fechaHoraFin":"2021-01-31 23:00"}
response body should be valid json
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].totalVenta and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[0-9.]*$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].productos[*].prepago.identificadorInternacional and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-z0-9]*$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].productos[*].prepago.identificadorCarga and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-z0-9]*$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].cliente.unico and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[0-9-]{1,20}$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].cliente.elektra and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[0-9-]{1,20}$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].ventaEmpleado.numeroEmpleado and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^T[0-9-]{1,10}$
deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.codigoPostal and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[0-9-]{5}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.estado and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.municipio and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.colonia and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.calle and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.numeroInterior and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9-@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.latitud and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,&-_\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.longitud and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,&-_\s:]{1,50}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.domicilio.referencias[*].referencia and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,255}$

deciphering with the key privateKey the response field $.resultado.pedidos[*].datosEntrega.personaRecibe.nombre and RSA_PKCS1_PADDING as encryption algorithm should be ^[A-Za-záéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ0-9@.,Ññ\t\s:]{1,50}$

elements.description: Verificar que se obtenga una salida incorrecta al enviar una petición malformada desde una transacción POST en /pedidos/folio/busquedas
elements.name: 400 Entrada Incorrecta

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json
I have valid client TLS configuration
I set x-idSucursal header to null
I need to encrypt the parameters {idUsuario, clienteUnico}

I use the encryption algorithm RSA_PKCS1_PADDING and the key publicKey for prepare a body as {"idUsuario":"T146363","clienteUnico":"1-1-4624-9705-1","fechaHoraInicio":"2021-01-30 08:00","fechaHoraFin":"2021-01-31 23:00"}
response body should be valid json

elements.description: Verificar que se obtenga un error inesperado desde una transacción POST en /pedidos/folio/busquedas
elements.name: 500 Operacion Inesperada

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json
I have valid client TLS configuration
I set x-ismock header to true
I set x-idPais header to sa
I need to encrypt the parameters {idUsuario, clienteUnico}
